channel.title: Comments on: Forums
channel.description: Official site of the House of Whack Board Game

item.title: By: Keith carlisle
item.dc:creator: Keith carlisle
item.description: I recently purchased a used copy of house of whack. Upon looking inside it is missing the whack track. Would it be possible to get a copy of the track to be able to play the game?
item.content:encoded: I recently purchased a used copy of house of whack. Upon looking inside it is missing the whack track. Would it be possible to get a copy of the track to be able to play the game?

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
If you look at many of the cards in the game, they have a web address. Many of those addresses lead to pages with downloadable content specific to that component.
Do you mean the "Whack Ball" room? There isn't anything called "Whack Room".
item.content:encoded:
If you look at many of the cards in the game, they have a web address. Many of those addresses lead to pages with downloadable content specific to that component.

Do you mean the “Whack Ball” room? There isn’t anything called “Whack Room”.

item.title: By: Lord Ocean
item.dc:creator: Lord Ocean
item.description: The back of the box mentions some kind of downloadable content or expansion, so that should be somewhere on this site, right? But where? Also, there seems to be no reference to the 'Whack Room' room card in the rules I assumed this was to be mentioned on the website? There's a Whack card too that tells you to look it up online. How?
item.content:encoded: The back of the box mentions some kind of downloadable content or expansion, so that should be somewhere on this site, right? But where? Also, there seems to be no reference to the ‘Whack Room’ room card in the rules I assumed this was to be mentioned on the website? There’s a Whack card too that tells you to look it up online. How?

item.title: By: seth
item.dc:creator: seth
item.description: you should include pictures of the game on your site. it makes me very curious and id love to see people playing the game and what the board game actually looks like
item.content:encoded: you should include pictures of the game on your site. it makes me very curious and id love to see people playing the game and what the board game actually looks like
